ygData.subject: Re: More Robe Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Uh, perhaps you should wait for more than a couple of lvls before hitting Najena :)  Stick with getting the Gossimer robe in Befallen, you shouldn t have too
ygData.messageBody:
Uh, perhaps you should wait for more than a couple of lvls before hitting
Najena :) Stick with getting the Gossimer robe in Befallen, you shouldn't
have too much trouble with a good party.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: McCartney, Michael R <Michael.McCartney2@...>
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 12:03 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: More Robe Stuff


>From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
>
>Go to Befallen and get some Demask robes... or if you can... hit that
Tharmateurgist (spelling?) and get his (Gossmer I think, maybe he just has
the brown robes though... either is better than guild robes.)
>
>Couple more levels... group with a few higher levelers and hit Najere for
Flowing black... ;)
>
>Drev
>
